xldoc.description: Home page for the rbjones.com web site.
xldoc.keywords: rbjones logic philosophy positivism metaphysics utopia

section.title: Introduction
section.abstract: This is the web site of Roger Bishop Jones, a philosopher/logician.

subsec.p: My ongoing work is now organised and presented as four major projects, three in progress and one for the future.

secref.title: A Conversation between Carnap and Grice
secref.p: A joint enterprise of Jones and Speranza.

section.title: A Conversation between Carnap and Grice
Existential Expressionism
section.abstract: This is a project for the future. It is "practical philosophy", i.e. is concerned with ethics, values, politics and economics. Also a "philosophy of life". It is built around something like Dao.
